question: As salaamu Alaikum Barakatuh besides the prayer and Dhikr to help with the success of of this ummat? what ways should we protect ourselves? Are chemical wepons halaal ?. Jazakallah Khair
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Allah Ta'ala says, 'And whosoever obeys Allah and His Rasul (Sallallaahu
Alayhi Wasallam) has attained great success.'

As Muslims, our success in every sphere of life, domestic, social, political
is in fulfilling the orders of Allah Ta'ala and His Rasul (Sallallaahu
Alayhi Wasallam). The laws of Allah pertaining to the different spheres of
life should be studied and practiced by every Muslim. Allah Ta'ala promises
us Khilaafat (rulership) if we strengthen our faith and do good deeds.

Muslims are required to prepare to defend themselves in every possible way.
If there is a possibility of being attacked by chemical weapons, we should
prepare ourselves in that as well.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
